headline: Gillette Venus, America’s #1 Female Shave Brand*, Aces its Upgrades to the Brand’s World Class Lineup for a "Shave That Serves Your Skin"
summary: BOSTON, March 12, 2025--Since 2018, Venus has championed positivity and self-expression through My Skin. My Way. — empowering women to feel powerful and unapologetic in their own skin. This year, the brand is excited to introduce updates to its trusted product line, so that there are no compromises when it comes to shaving.
